text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_BILLING_REVIEW 
    (CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_ID,
	DESCRIPTION,
	ERROR,
	STATUS) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',
	''',item().Prop_0,''',
	''',activity('Script Insert Table CC_BILLING_REVIEW').Error.Message,''',
	''E''
	)')
